long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the shadowy mystery of Omen from Valorant with this captivating live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A dark and enigmatic interface inspired by Omen’s spectral presence and tactical prowess.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that echoes Omen’s mysterious and calculated nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Valorant-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as stealthy and powerful as Omen’s abilities.
